identity.tone: Refined Authority, Organic Luxury, Global Connectivity
key_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Old World Trade aesthetics with Modern SaaS precision.
Emotion First: Calm assurance, tactile warmth.
Negative Space: Massive breathing room (p-12 to p-32).
No Generic Gradients: Use grain/noise or solid earthy tones.

theme.strategy: Organic & Earthy (The 'Old Money' Global Trade Look)

headings.usage: All H1-H3 headers. H1 should be massive (text-6xl+).

rules: NO bright greens (#00FF00) or trendy neon.
Use 'Warm Clay' (#B46A4D) sparingly for high-value CTAs.

layout.spacing_scale: Generous. Use p-12, p-24, p-32 for section padding.
layout.grid_system: Bento Grid (Mode A) for products. Asymmetric 'Tetris' grid for Marketing.
layout.border_radius: rounded-none (Sharp) or rounded-sm (2px) for a 'Trade/Logistics' feel. Avoid fully rounded corners unless for buttons.

guidelines: Parallax: Use `useScroll` and `useTransform` for background images.
Text Reveal: Staggered fade-up for all headings.
Hover: Slow, elegant scales (duration: 0.5s). No snappy/jerky movements.
Scroll: Lenis integration for 'heavy' luxurious scroll feel.

hero_section.visuals: Full-screen background image (darkened with overlay) + Centered Elegant Typography.

product_grid.style: Sharp edges, minimal borders, large images, small text labels.

sustainability_strip.style: Olive background, White text. Infinite scroll of certifications (GOTS, Oeko-Tex).

contact_form.style: Transparent inputs with bottom border only (Line style). No boxy inputs.

media.instructions: Use 'hero_texture' for parallax backgrounds. Use 'bedding_product' and 'bedroom_interior' for Product Cards. Use 'craftsmanship' for Story/Sustainability. Use 'cargo_ship' for Global Network.

instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALL: `npm install lenis framer-motion` or `yarn add lenis framer-motion` immediately.
LAYOUT: Do not use standard Shadcn Cards for the Product Grid. Build custom Grid Items with aspect-ratio styling.
NAV: Create a 'Glassmorphic' sticky navbar that condenses on scroll.
EMAILJS: Integrate contact form with EmailJS (Service ID: mock_service, Template ID: mock_template).
ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure text contrast on images (use dark overlays or text-shadows).
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: `transition: all`.
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add `.App { text-align: center; }` in the css file.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations.
All interactive and key informational elements MUST include a `data-testid` attribute.
